testimonials.title: Trusted by Restaurant Owners
testimonials.subtitle: See how BiteBase Intelligence has transformed restaurants across the globe.

stories.quote: BiteBase Intelligence helped us identify the perfect location for our second restaurant. The geospatial analytics were spot-on, and we saw a 40% increase in foot traffic compared to our projections.
stories.name: Maria Rodriguez
stories.title: Owner, Sabor Latino

stories.quote: The AI insights are incredible. We discovered our peak hours were different than we thought, optimized our staffing, and reduced costs by 25% while improving customer satisfaction.
stories.name: James Chen
stories.title: Manager, Dragon Palace

stories.quote: The competitor analysis feature is a game-changer. We can see what's working in our market and adapt our strategy accordingly. Our revenue has grown 35% since using BiteBase.
stories.name: Sarah Johnson
stories.title: CEO, Fresh & Fast
